Get ready to serve up delicious cuisine with this Staub cast iron cocotte, on sale right now for an unbelievable price at Amazon. 

Get deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone.  Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting nerds at Reviewed.

Shoppers can snag the 4-quart round Dutch oven for as low as $99.95—a $30.07 price cut from the original $130.02 price tag at Amazon. The larger Staub cast iron 5.5-quart round cocotte (from $319) is the best Dutch oven we've ever tested, so this smaller model is sure to impress even the most skilled chefs. This model features a tempered glass lid for optimal heat control and a multi-coat enamel which the brand claims is resistant to chips, scratches and discoloration—and the sale price covers the cherry red, black and white models. 

► Allbirds sale:  Get 20% off these popular sneakers right now

Designed for searing, boiling, deep-frying, braising, browning and so much more, this versatile pot can be used in the oven and on both induction and traditional stovetops. Better still, there's no pre-seasoning required, so you can start using your newest cooking essential right away. 

► Presidents' Day sales:  Shop all the best deals on furniture, mattresses and everything in between 

When testing the bigger 5.5-quart model, our testers called the customer-favorite Dutch oven "an absolute favorite for anything and everything in the kitchen," and noted that it "produced a deeply flavorful broth, evenly roasted chicken pieces and the tallest sourdough loaf of the bunch." 

Whether you want to perfect your culinary skills with some high-quality cookware or simply treat yourself to a tasty deal, look no further than the Staub cast iron 4-quart cocotte. A deal this good certainly won't last, so be sure to shop fast! 

Get the Staub Cast Iron 4-Quart Round Cocotte from $99.95 (save $5.01 to $107.65).

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
